name: Miku & Wendy: Imagine That
description:
With an imagination, anything is possible. 

With an imaginary friend, everything is fun. 

Join Miku & Wendy on the fishing adventure of a lifetime as they strive to rebuild what was lost...at bath time.

 What will you fish out of the drain?

Player Input:

This game was for: WeeklyGameJam / Week: 93 / Theme: Fishing

TEAM: Writer/Narrative: Felmuffin / Code/Audio: Dr_Monkfish / Art: ShainaSenpai
